first_para: Benedict Michael "Ben" Gummer (born 19 February 1978) is a British Conservative Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ipswich. He is currently Parliamentary Private Secretary to Nicky Morgan, Secretary of State for Education.

full.extract: Benedict Michael "Ben" Gummer (born 19 February 1978) is a British Conservative Party politician and the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ipswich. He is currently Parliamentary Private Secretary to Nicky Morgan, Secretary of State for Education.
full.title: Ben Gummer
